title: First Look: FSA K-Force Bar with AGX Loops Go All-In on Aero-Endurance-Gravel
content:
FSA's K-Force AGX steps up for aero-endurance-gravel with a $349 USD flared-drop gravel bar with optional $269 USD aero loop extension.

Read the full article at First Look: FSA K-Force Bar with AGX Loops Go All-In on Aero-Endurance-Gravel on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
